title: Gorgeous Monster
description: I should’ve known better than to make a deal with a monster.When my ex-boyfriend puts a hit out on me, there’s only one man I can run to for protection.Cristian Marchetti.The head of the Marchetti Mafia Family.My best friend’s father.My last resort.Cristian’s protection doesn’t come free.But what he wants might cost me my life.He’s the mafia king, and I’m his sacrifice.And now, I must become his wife.
author: Charity Ferrell
